results.name: Largest k such that k! divides C(2n,n).
comment: All a(n) >= 2, with a(n) = 2 if and only if n is in A005836. - _Robert Israel_, Feb 01 2019
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: for k from 2 do if not (x/k!)::integer then return k-1 fi od
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Oct 28 2002
